@@ -98,1 +98,1 @@ - * + * @@ -112,6 +112,1 @@ - * Notes about the current implementation: - *
    - *
  1. A black colored light is ignored since its contribution is 0. - *
  2. The transparency (alpha) component of a light is ignored. - *
- * There are no guarantee that these behaviors will not change. + * See also the implementation notes section. @@ -164,0 +159,8 @@ + * @implNote + * The following applies to the {@code color} property of the light: + *
    + *
  1. A black colored light is ignored since its contribution is 0. + *
  2. The transparency (alpha) component of a light is ignored. + *
+ * These behaviors are not specified and could change in the future. + *
